text: Some development corporations have sought to attract private investors by leasing part of the shopping area to companies experienced in commercial development who have undertaken the building and letting of the shops. But corporations have generally found it more satisfactory to build themselves, leasing the shops direct to traders, with of the town.
handwritten_text: Some development corporations have sought to attract private investors by leasing part of the shopping area to companies experienced in commercial development who have undertaken the building and letting of the shops. But corporations have generally found it more satisfactory to build themselves, leasing the shops direct to traders, with of the town.
